titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons preached by Master Henry Smith: with a prayer for the morning thereunto adioyned. And published by a more perfect copy then heeretofore

titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons preached by Master Henry Smith: with a prayer for the morning thereunto adioyned. And published by a more perfect copy then heeretofore
Sermons. Selected sermons
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Hall] for William Leake, dwelling in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Holy-Ghost,

notesStmt.note: The first part includes "The sinners conversion" and "The sinners confession". "Foure sermons" (including "The first [-second] sermon of the song of old Father Simeon", "The calling of Jonah", and "The rebellion of Jonah") has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
"Foure sermons" identified as STC 22763 on UMI microfilm reel 1363 position 9.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy: "Foure sermons" only; some print faded with loss of print; some pages stained. Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy: some print faded and show-through.
